_source.short_desc: Create your own social network with an activity feed, member profiles, sub-groups and more.
_source.long_desc: A Mighty Network gives you the ability to create your own social network with an activity feed, member profiles, sub-groups, chat messages and more, on the web, native iOS and Android apps, all under your brand. No ads and fully private if you choose. Create articles with a rich CMS, embed images, videos and sound files, and post engaging questions and polls, all of which support comments and cheers. You can even charge for access with a one-time payment or a subscription, monthly or annually.
_source.pricing_details:
Mighty Networks pricing starts at $39/month and scales with each tier, outlined below: 
The Community Plan - $39/month billed monthly or $33/month billed annually
The Business Plan - $119/month billed monthly or $99/month billed annually
A 14-day free trial is available for The Business Plan. 
We also have an enterprise solution, Mighty Pro, which gives successful creators, brands, and organizations the ability to have their own mobile apps and listings in the Apple App Store and Google Play. Please reach out to request a call to learn more about pricing at mightynetworks.com/pro
_source.target_audience: A Mighty Network is designed for entrepreneurs & creators who want to bring together their community, online courses, website, events, & memberships under their own brand, on web, iOS, and Android.

media.caption: You can create, run, and market online courses directly within your Mighty Network. Native course video upload means the experience is super seamless for members.

Content can be organized into featured sections to help members easily find what's most important to them and to enable brands and creators to promote the content, events, and courses they care about.
Create a community you own on web and mobile with a familiar and easy to use personalized activity feed for your members. You can add rich content and embeds and it's easy to navigate for members.
Host, organize, and promote live events, offline events, and other virtual events through your Mighty Network.
Go live from directly in your Mighty Network to supercharge your engagement.

related_products.short_desc: Keep your launches smooth and your communication clear by using Trello to see which tasks are on track, and which content is up next.
related_products.features: From planning a launch, to editorial calendar content, to meeting agendas and everything in between, Trello helps your marketing teams get more done. Trello is the command center that connects all your tasks and tools to show status updates, due dates, and allows you to quickly comment back and forth to teammates. Attach files and tickets from other apps like Google Docs and Salesforce, so everything stays together. Keep launches smooth and your whole marketing team on the same page.

related_products.short_desc: Hootsuite helps you build your brand, strengthen connections with customers, and drive real business results with social media.
related_products.features: Social media is a wild place to do business. That's why thousands of brands rely on Hootsuite's tools and expertise to bring order to the chaos. Launch brilliant social campaigns, deliver 5-star social commerce experiences, and manage all your customer conversations in one place. Plus, get access to industry leading certifications, training, and coaching to help you push your results on social media further, faster.

related_products.short_desc: Social media solution that helps businesses manage content, create and edit posts, and monitor engagement across Instagram accounts.
related_products.features: Social media solution that helps businesses manage content, create and edit posts, and monitor engagement across Instagram accounts.

related_products.short_desc: Social media marketing solution that helps businesses create personalized marketing plans based on targeted audience and budget.
related_products.features: Social media marketing solution that helps businesses create personalized marketing plans based on targeted audience and budget.

related_products.short_desc: Workplace connects everyone in an organization using familiar Facebook features like chat, video calling, posts and groups.
related_products.features: Workplace connects everyone in an organization using familiar Facebook features like Chat, video calling, posts and Groups. It integrates with the business tools you already use and provides a simple, secure and more productive way for people to share knowledge, work together and build connected communities.

related_products.short_desc: #1 social intranet and private social networking software for businesses used by over 8 million businesses worldwide.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 is free social intranet software available both in cloud and on premise. It's 100% free when used by small teams. Bitrix24 comes with over 30 free intranet tools, open source code, mobile apps, API, content management systems, social and classic interfaces, and integrations for Active Directory, SharePoint lists, Outlook and MS Exchange. Unlimited user plans are available.

related_products.short_desc: Sprout Social offers social media engagement, publishing, analytics, listening and reporting solutions for leading agencies and brands.
related_products.features: Sprout Social offers social media engagement, publishing, analytics, listening and reporting solutions for leading agencies and brands including Loews Hotel, NBC Universal, Macys, Chipotle and Sony. Available via web browser, iOS and Android, Sprout enables brands to simplify social management, collaborate across teams and provide an exceptional customer experience. Sprout Social supports Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Pinterest.

related_products.short_desc: All-in-one Social Media Management solution for publishing, reporting, influencer marketing, benchmarking, and engagement.
related_products.features: Brandwatch (formerly Falcon.io) offers is a leading solution for social media monitoring, engagement, publishing, analytics, and customer data management. It enables brands to explore the full potential of digital marketing and advertising by managing multiple customer touchpoints while allowing marketers to deliver more personalized brand experiences based on enriched customer profiles.

related_products.short_desc: A full fledged alumni management solution (SAAS) for educational institutions & corporates to build their exclusive alumni networks.
related_products.features:
Helps educational institutions in managing alumni database and improving alumni engagement with 450+ clients across 20 regions including India, Australia, Europe, Malaysia, Indonesia, Middle East, Africa, Japan, Philippines, USA, West Indies.

Helps Corporates to stay connected with former staff, enhancing employer branding, re-hiring and referrals, One-stop Exits Helpdesk for all the alumni queries trusted by Corporates like Qualcomm, TataSteel, RBEI, organizations like United Nations GESCI.

related_products.short_desc: NiceJob is the easiest way to highlight your customer reviews across social media. Turn your reviews into stories and social posts.
related_products.features: With NiceJob, highlighting your customer reviews across social media is easy. Our social sharing feature allows you to turn your reviews into stories and posts that you can share with the push of a button. Our software picks out the best lines and turns them into images that can be displayed across different social channels, taking word-of-mouth marketing to the next level.

related_products.short_desc: MangoApps is a unified communications and social networking platform that serves as a bridge between desk and deskless workers.
related_products.features: MangoApps is a communications and social networking platform that serves as a bridge between desk and deskless workers. Everyone can sign into our user-friendly platform from whatever device suits them best, and get a custom dashboard, flexible notification settings, and a simple, streamlined experience. This ensures that everyone can get to the conversations  that hey need, with no barriers, and makes it easy for your company to push out consistent, engaging messages to the entire workforce.

similar_products.short_desc: Unlock the potential of your community with the most flexible and powerful all-in-one social network solution for community management.
similar_products.features: Unlock the potential of your community with Hivebrite, the most advanced all-in-one social networking platform. Easy to set up and fully branded to match your colors, Hivebrite helps you build brand engagement and create opportunities for your private social network. Manage your member database, centralize the communication with your members, create events and collect online payments, all from a single user-friendly interface.

similar_products.short_desc: Create your own social network with an activity feed, member profiles, sub-groups and more.
similar_products.features: A Mighty Network gives you the ability to create your own social network with an activity feed, member profiles, sub-groups, chat messages and more, on the web, native iOS and Android apps, all under your brand. No ads and fully private if you choose. Create articles with a rich CMS, embed images, videos and sound files, and post engaging questions and polls, all of which support comments and cheers. You can even charge for access with a one-time payment or a subscription, monthly or annually.

similar_products.short_desc: Launch your own community & social networking apps with no code. Includes VIP support and app maintenance.
similar_products.features:
Mighty Pro is for brands, organizations, and successful creators who understand the power of bringing your people together in your own branded apps. 

It's a community you own on the web and available in the Apple App Store and Google Play Store, delivered on your own native iOS, iPad, and Android apps. 

Mix and match features like livestreaming, native video, fun group chat, paid and free membership plans, plus online events, flexible groups, and immersive branding options.

similar_products.short_desc: More than ever, we need a place to bring everyone together and help each person succeed. That's Jostle.
similar_products.features: Discover a seriously simple platform that brings people together. Why? Because today's organizations are more complex than ever: people are dispersed, there's more info, and we have more ways to communicate than ever before. Striving to create a community at your workplace is an important goal, but it shouldn't add to this complexity. You need a way to help people participate in your culture and feel the value of the contribution they make. Jostle is designed to empower people and organizations.

It enables brands to explore the full potential of digital marketing and advertising by managing multiple customer touchpoints while allowing marketers to deliver more personalized brand experiences based on enriched customer profiles.

similar_products.short_desc: idloom.wall gathers all the best tools social media have to offer within one single multipurpose intra-extranet platform.
similar_products.features: idloom.wall is a revolutionary intra-extranet platform, combining the righteousness of traditional intranet solutions with the power of social media features and applications. Specialized in knowledge and expertise management, idloom.wall combines the strength of a collaborative platform with the flexibility and agility of a social network that you can taylor-fit to your organization's particular needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Raklet is an all-in-one social networking software that allows you to engage with your community in a meaningful, digital way.
similar_products.features:
Raklet is an all-in-one social networking software that allows you to engage with your community in a meaningful, digital way. 

Build, grow and monetize your audience through memberships, newsletters and other tools.

On top of a powerful CRM, you can create tiered membership plans, a custom application form, organize events & sell tickets, have your private social network, branded mobile app, and much more. It's the most simple and easy way to increase engagement and grow your social network.

Unlimited user plans are available.

similar_products.short_desc: HipSocial by 500apps is an all-in-one social media management tool helping businesses to manage social media accounts from one place
similar_products.features: HipSocial by 500apps helps businesses increase their social engagements and unlock the true power of social listening. With HipSocial, businesses can plan, schedule, and track content across various social networks with proper workflow. HipSocial also helps businesses go through brand mentions and engage with them separately. Along with that, they also receive detailed analytics reports of your posts.

similar_products.short_desc: The #1 student-to-student marketing solution for student admissions, purpose-built for higher education.
similar_products.features:
Unibuddy is the #1 student-to-student marketing solution that helps recruiters build authentic connections and empowers prospective students to feel confident in their school choice.

It is quick and easy to set-up, simple to use for everyone, it seamlessly integrates with your CRM, and offers training and support for your team.

Join 500+ institutions that use Unibuddy and have successfully scaled their admissions efforts.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Collaboration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Collaboration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Collaboration software enables the sharing of information by providing an online or intranet-based environment for virtual teamwork. These applications allow for greater efficiency in managing document libraries and versions, projects in progress, report editing, threaded discussions, calendar sharing, knowledge base search, workflow and task management. Collaboration solutions often feature integration for a variety of real-time communications tools including: video or voice conferencing, email and instant messaging. Collaboration software is related to Project Management software and Web Conferencing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Community software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Community tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Community software allows businesses to connect with their customers by creating a space for sharing ideas, collecting opinions, storing Q&A data, and interacting with fellow customers and business representatives.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Membership Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Membership Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobile Event Apps software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobile Event Apps tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobile Event Apps enable event organizers to consistently distribute important event information to the attendees in real time and facilitate networking among attendees.

_source.short_desc: Bring together your community, online courses, sales pages, and more in one place under your brand, across the web, iOS and Android.
_source.long_desc: Mighty Network serves creators and entrepreneurs by bringing together their community, online courses, sales pages, and more, all under their brand, across the web, and native iOS and Android apps. Connect members to each other with an activity feed, sub-groups, member categories, chat messages, and more. Create articles with a rich CMS, embed images, videos and sound files, and post engaging questions and polls, all of which support comments and cheers.
_source.pricing_details:
Mighty Networks pricing starts at $39/month and scales with each tier, outlined below: 
The Community Plan - $39/month billed monthly or $33/month billed annually
The Business Plan - $119/month billed monthly or $99/month billed annually
A 14-day free trial is available for The Business Plan. 
We also have an enterprise solution, Mighty Pro, which gives successful creators, brands, and organizations the ability to have their own mobile apps and listings in the Apple App Store and Google Play. Please reach out to request a call to learn more about pricing at mightynetworks.com/pro
_source.target_audience: A Mighty Network is designed for entrepreneurs & creators who want to bring together their community, online courses, website, events, & memberships under their own brand, on web, iOS, and Android.

media.caption: You can create, run, and market online courses directly within your Mighty Network. Native course video upload means the experience is super seamless for members.

Content can be organized into featured sections to help members easily find what's most important to them and to enable brands and creators to promote the content, events, and courses they care about.
Create a community you own on web and mobile with a familiar and easy to use personalized activity feed for your members. You can add rich content and embeds and it's easy to navigate for members.
Host, organize, and promote live events, offline events, and other virtual events through your Mighty Network.
Go live from directly in your Mighty Network to supercharge your engagement.

related_products.short_desc: Slack brings all your communication together in one place. It's real-time messaging, archiving and search for modern teams.
related_products.features: Slack is a collaboration hub, where the right people and the right information come together, helping everyone get work done. When your team needs to kick off a project, hire a new employee, deploy some code, review a sales contract, finalize next year's budget, measure an A/B test, plan your next office opening, and more, Slack has you covered. Try Slack with your team for free.

related_products.short_desc: Social media solution that helps businesses manage content, create and edit posts, and monitor engagement across Instagram accounts.
related_products.features: Social media solution that helps businesses manage content, create and edit posts, and monitor engagement across Instagram accounts.

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk provides the complete customer service solution that's easy to use and scales with your business.
related_products.features: Zendesk is the only complete customer service solution, that is both easy to use and scales with your business. On average, companies using Zendesk increase customer satisfaction by 25% and agent productivity by 30% - at any scale. All your customer interactions live in a single, dynamic interface with features like web widgets, pre-defined ticket responses, and a full customer history. Get up and running quickly, and expect to see results even faster.

related_products.short_desc: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful website, online store, or portfolio.
related_products.features: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful online presence. Look like an expert right from the start with award-winning templates for your website, online store, or portfolio. Customize the design to fit your personal style and professional needs. Get found in search by more people with powerful SEO tools. Learn where your website traffic is coming from, what your visitors are looking for, and how they're interacting with your content or products with in-depth Analytics tools.

related_products.short_desc: Workplace connects everyone in an organization using familiar Facebook features like chat, video calling, posts and groups.
related_products.features: Workplace connects everyone in an organization using familiar Facebook features like Chat, video calling, posts and Groups. It integrates with the business tools you already use and provides a simple, secure and more productive way for people to share knowledge, work together and build connected communities.

related_products.short_desc: Affordable, All-In-One Solution to streamline community management,  memberships, email marketing, website design & more.  Try A Demo!

related_products.short_desc: Flock is a collaboration tool that helps you get work done, only faster! Trusted by over 32,000 businesses globally.

related_products.short_desc: Create a stand-alone branded website for your members. and engage with your customer community.
related_products.features:
QuestionPro is a leading SaaS survey solutions company providing a wide range of applications to measure and manage customer experience, employee engagement, and the pulse of the audience. Conduct video discussions and multiple polls with online communities.

Send surveys in under 5 mins with 40+ question types, ready-made survey templates, and customizable design themes. We are ISO 27001 certified and comply with leading data security standards and data privacy laws including GDPR.

related_products.short_desc: Influitive offers a unique solution designed for CS, CX, and Product teams to engage with customers and gather rapid feedback.
related_products.features: Influitive offers a unique community solution designed for CS, CX, and Product teams to engage with customers and gather rapid feedback on any topic. Influitive combines a modern approach to forums and gamification and even integrates with existing communities powered by Salesforce and Khoros to create seamless customer experiences. The community solution also supports employee intranets.

related_products.short_desc: ON24 provides digital experiences and webcasting for corporate communications and demand generation via a cloud-based SaaS application.

Through ON24, marketers can create Live, On Demand and Personalized Engagement, turn it into actionable intelligence and integrate it across their operations. Informed by over a billion engagement minutes, marketers drive more revenue from ON24 than any other channel.

related_products.short_desc: Quip is a new way to collaborate with your team that combines documents, spreadsheets, to-do's, and chat in one seamless experience.
related_products.features: Quip is a new way to collaborate with your team and customers that combines documents, spreadsheets, checklists, and chat in one seamless experience. Create an easy-to-use intranet by organizing your content into shareable folders for easy navigation and discovery. Used by thousands of the most innovative companies in the world: Facebook, NewRelic, Quora, and Pinterest. Available on web, Mac, Windows, Android, and iOS. Get started with Quip for free.

similar_products.short_desc: Strengthen community engagement and grow fully branded private communities with Hivebrite's all-in-one community management platform.
similar_products.features: Hivebrite is an all-in-one community management platform. It empowers organizations of all sizes and sectors to launch, manage, and grow fully branded private communities. Keep member data up-to-date, manage memberships and events, collect payments, centralize communication, and more from one easy-to-use platform. Over 1000 clients worldwide use Hivebrite to create and engage communities.

similar_products.short_desc: #1 Virtual community and enablement platform to recruit & mentor students, engage alumni & volunteers, & cultivate donors at scale.

From recruiting and mentoring students or volunteers to cultivating donors, Graduway enables all online community management. In addition to partnerships with over 2,000 educational institutions, the company extends its solutions to other nonprofits and healthcare organizations worldwide.

similar_products.short_desc: Zapnito is the SaaS community platform for intelligent organizations.
similar_products.features:

similar_products.short_desc: The Webex Events (formerly Socio) online event community platform enables year-round, continuous attendee engagement and networking.

Event marketers and organizers can connect their customers and power ongoing learning, engagement, collaboration, and networking in one central location. Enable year-round participation with virtual events, virtual roundtables, games, and more, all hosted within the online community. Full branding and customization options are also available.

similar_products.short_desc: Participate is an online platform for streamlining the set-up and management of social learning communities.
similar_products.features:
Participate allows organizations with models that depend on social learning communities to scale their initiatives, with no loss in quality, while streamlining their operations. 

Using our social learning platform, customers can easily create, grow, and sustain social learning communities. Our ability to capture, aggregate and and give recognition for knowledge created in these communities is our key differentiator.

similar_products.short_desc: Give your community a digital space where they can connect with you and your mission 365 days a year even when meeting isn't possible.
similar_products.features:
Make it your business to enable everyone in your community develop lasting relationships with you and each other via 1-on-1 chats, private and open groups, social walls, virtual business cards, community hub, webinars and more. 

Give your community a digital space where they can share their ideas, discuss various topics and stay social even when meeting in person is not an option.

Enable your community to thrive now. 

Glue Up (a.k.a. EventBank) is an all-in-one software for communities.

similar_products.short_desc: More than ever, we need a place to bring everyone together and help each person succeed. That's Jostle.
similar_products.features: Discover a seriously simple tool that brings people together. Why? Because today's organizations are more complex than ever: people are dispersed, there's more info, and we have more ways to communicate than ever before. Striving to create a community at your workplace is a noble goal, but it shouldn't add to this complexity. You need a way to help people participate in your culture and feel the value of the contribution they make. Jostle is designed to empower people and organizations.

Open Socials community engagement platform allows organizations to empower their members to come together, communicate and collaborate from anywhere in the world.  Drive real-world change and create organizational value with an online platform and purpose-built extensions for managing, mobilizing and engaging new and existing members.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Collaboration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Collaboration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Collaboration software enables the sharing of information by providing an online or intranet-based environment for virtual teamwork. These applications allow for greater efficiency in managing document libraries and versions, projects in progress, report editing, threaded discussions, calendar sharing, knowledge base search, workflow and task management. Collaboration solutions often feature integration for a variety of real-time communications tools including: video or voice conferencing, email and instant messaging. Collaboration software is related to Project Management software and Web Conferencing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Directory software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Directory tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Directory software is used to create product and services classifieds, informational portals and membership lists with or without monetization options.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Knowledge Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Knowledge Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Knowledge Management software offers ways to optimize the utility of intellectual capital and intangible assets by capturing, preserving and organizing institutional knowledge in a measurable format. Knowledge Management solutions allow successful strategies to be transferred and replicated throughout an organization. Implementation can be inwardly focused on faster learning, new knowledge creation, and innovation or directed outwardly, providing a self-guided service path for customers. Knowledge Management software is related to Business Intelligence software and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Social Networking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Social Networking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Social Networking software supports customer interactions with one another as well as with the organization. Search Engine optimization, blogging, podcasting, newsletters, profile pages, message boards, viral content and membership directories are all Social Networking software features, which can increase web-traffic, visibility, and interactivity for companies with a web presence. Social Networking is related to Contact Management software, Content Management software, Membership Management software, and Portal software.
